item.title: About
item.description:
Halo, nama saya Tegar Sabila. Saya memiliki latar belakang di bidang Teknik Komputer Jaringan dan sangat tertarik mendalami teknologi, seperti pemrograman, desain grafis, dan seni digital.

Tentang Blog Ini

Blog ini saya buat untuk:

  • Mencatat perjalanan belajar saya di dunia teknologi.
  • Berbagi pengalaman dan pengetahuan.
  • Membantu orang lain yang memiliki minat serupa.

Saya berharap blog ini bisa menjadi sumber inspirasi dan referensi untuk pembaca yang ingin belajar atau mengeksplorasi teknologi.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
At TegarNote, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website https://. By using our site, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

Information We Collect

We collect information to improve our website and services. The types of information we may collect include:

  • Personal Information: When you subscribe to our newsletter, leave a comment, or contact us, we may collect personal details such as your name, email address, and any other information you provide.
  • Non-Personal Information: We may also collect non-personal data such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and the pages you visit on our site.

How We Use Your Information

The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
